S02vadhdhgu:1: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasamaye bhagavān kauśāmbyāṃ viharati sma /
S02vadhdhgu:2: kaṇṭakasaṃjñake mahāvanavare mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ paṃcamātrair bhikṣuśataiḥ saṃbahulaiś ca bodhisatvair mahāsatvaiḥ sarvabuddhadharmaguṇasamanvāgataiḥ
S02vadhdhgu:3: tena khalu punaḥ samayena kauśāmbyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ sucandro nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati sma /
S02vadhdhgu:4_1: śrāddho mahāśrāddhaḥ sa yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrānta upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau
S02vadhdhgu:4_2: śirasā vanditvā bhagavantam anekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣaṇīkṛtyaikānte nyaṣīdat*
S02vadhdhgu:4_3: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaḥ sucandro gṛhapatir bhagavantam etad avocat*
S02vadhdhgu:5: pṛccheyam ahaṃ bhagavantaṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ kaṃcit pradeśaṃ praṣṭuṃ /
S02vadhdhgu:6: sacen me bhagavān avakāśaṃ kuryāt pṛṣṭapraśnavyākaraṇāya //

S02vadhdhgu:9: evam ukte sucandro gṛhapatir bhagavantam etad avocat* kathaṃ bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daridro bhūtvā adaridro bhavati vyādhitaś ca bhūtvā avyādhito bhavati //
S02vadhdhgu:10: atha khalu bhagavāṃ jānann eva sucandraṃ gṛhapatim etad avocat* kim iti tvaṃ gṛhapate adaridratāyā praśnaṃ pṛcchasi //

S02vadhdhgu:53_0: iyaṃ sā gṛhapate vasudhārā nāma dhāraṇī asyā dhāraṇyānubhāvena rogadurbhikṣamarakāntārādayo
S02vadhdhgu:53_1: na prabhavanti yas tu gṛhapate imāni vasudhārādhāraṇīmantrapadāni tathāgatānām arhatānāṃ
S02vadhdhgu:53_2: samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā ekarātram āvartaye tasya mahāpuruṣamātrayā dhārayā
S02vadhdhgu:54: sarvadhānyaiḥ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ sarvopadravāṃś ca nāśayati tena hi tvaṃ gṛhapate udgṛhṇīṣvemāṃ vasudhārādhāraṇīṃ dhāraya vācaya deśaya /
S02vadhdhgu:56: tat te bhaviṣyati dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāyeti sādhu bhagavann iti /
S02vadhdhgu:57_0: sucandro gṛhapatir bhagavato 'ntikād imāṃ vasudhārādhāraṇīṃ śrutvā hṛṣṭas tuṣṭa udagra
S02vadhdhgu:57_1: āttamanā pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhagavataś caraṇayor nipatya bhagavantam
S02vadhdhgu:57_2: etad avocat* udgṛhītā me vasudhārādhāraṇī prahvīkṛtā dhāritā vācitā paryavāptā idānīṃ
S02vadhdhgu:58: atha khalu sucandro gṛhapatir bhagavantam anekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ punar anavalokya bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ
S02vadhdhgu:59: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma /
S02vadhdhgu:60: gaccha tvam ānanda sucandragṛhapater niveśanaṃ gatvā cākāraṃ paśya paripūrṇaṃ dhanadhānyasamṛddhaṃ ratnasamṛddhaṃ ca /
S02vadhdhgu:62_0: athāyuṣmān ānandaḥ sucandrasya gṛhapater niveśanaṃ dṛṣṭvā vismitaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto
S02vadhdhgu:62_1: bhagavantam etad avocat* ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yena sucandro gṛhapatir mahādhano
S02vadhdhgu:64: śrāddhaḥ ānanda sucandro gṛhapatiḥ paramaśrāddhaḥ kalyāṇāśayo dhāritā cānena vasudhārādhāraṇī pravartitā udgṛhītā vācitā /
S02vadhdhgu:66: tena hy ānanda tvam udgṛhṇīṣvemāṃ vasudhārādhāraṇīṃ dhāraya grāhaya /
S02vadhdhgu:70: tad bhaviṣyati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyair mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇāṃ /
S02vadhdhgu:71: nāham ānanda samanupaśyāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ /
S02vadhdhgu:74: tat kasya hetoḥ abhedyā hy ete ānanda dhāraṇīmantrapadāni na caiṣā kṣīṇakuśalamūlānāṃ satvānāṃ śrutipatham apy āgamiṣyati kaḥ punar vādo pustagatā vā hṛdayagatā dhāritā vā /
S02vadhdhgu:75: tat kasya hetoḥ sarvatathāgatānām eṣā vākyaṃ sarvatathāgatair eṣā dhāraṇī bhāṣitā adhiṣṭhitā /
S02vadhdhgu:76_0: dharmamudrayā mudritā anumoditā prakāśitā prabhāvitā praśastā saṃvarṇitārocitā vivṛtottānīkṛtā
S02vadhdhgu:76_1: ākhyātā sarvasatvānāṃ daridrāṇāṃ vyādhiparipīḍitānāṃ sarvabhayopadrutānāṃ satvānām arthāyeti /
S02vadhdhgu:78: udgṛhītā me bhagavaṃn iyaṃ vasudhārādhāraṇī dhāritā vācitā /
S02vadhdhgu:80: ity athāyuṣmān ānanda utthāyāsanāt tasyāṃ velāyāṃ kṛtakarapuṭo evam udānam udānayati sma //
